title: Interview: Realme VP talks fast charging, U.S. availability, and more
content:
At Mobile World Congress this year, Realme announced its newest flagship phone, the Realme GT 2 Pro, along with the GT 2. At the event in Barcelona, on the 14th floor of my hotel with a view overlooking the city, I got a chance to sit down with Mr. Madhav Sheth, Realme VP and Realme

The post Interview: Realme VP talks fast charging, U.S. availability, and more appeared first on xda-developers.
description: In an interview with Realme VP Madhav Sheth, we talk about 150W charging, the commitment to keep the charger in the box, and more.
